headline: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June
intro: Despite a 4% gain in benchmark indices in 2025, Indian equity markets remain volatile due to global trade tensions. InCred Equities recommends 21 stocks with an ?Add? rating, highlighting a favorable monsoon and strong GVA growth as key positives for investors.
imagecaption: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June

headline: Bajaj Auto share price falls over 2% after Q4 results. Should you buy or sell?
intro: Bajaj Auto share price has risen over 8% in one month, and more than 10% in three months. The auto stock is flat YTD, and has declined 3% in the past one year. However, Bajaj Auto shares have delivered strong returns over the long term.
imagecaption: Bajaj Auto share price has rallied 90% in two years and has generated multibagger returns of 221% over the past five years.

headline: Bajaj Auto, Samvardhana Motherson to NBCC: Six companies that declared dividend along with Q4 results
intro: Dividend Stocks: Bajaj Auto, Motherson, NBCC, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Ltd, SJVN and Sobha Ltd are the Six companies that declared dividend along with Q4 results.
imagecaption: Dividend Stocks: Five companies that declared dividend

headline: Stocks to Watch: Suzlon, Ola, Bajaj Auto, Mazagon Dock, Senco Gold among shares in focus on May 30
intro: The domestic equity market is anticipated to decline on May 30 following weak global trends. Key Indian firms like Suzlon Energy reported strong profits, while Ola Electric saw a significant increase in losses. Overall, market sentiment remains cautious amid economic concerns in the US.
imagecaption: Stocks to Watch: Suzlon, Ola, Bajaj Auto, Mazagon Dock, Senco Gold among shares in focus on May 30

headline: Bajaj Auto flags danger of production cuts by July if rare-earth magnet issue remains unresolved
intro: Chinese restrictions on key rare-earth magnets posed an existential threat to the electric vehicle business, the auto company said.
imagecaption: Bajaj?s management said that the launch timeline for the two-wheeler company?s upcoming electric variants will also be impacted.

headline: Bajaj Auto Q4 Results: Net profit rises 6% to  ?2,049 crore, revenue up 6% YoY; Dividend declared
intro: Bajaj Auto Q4 Results: Bajaj, India's top auto exporter by volume, reported a 20% jump in overseas shipments. In contrast, domestic sales fell 8%.
imagecaption: Bajaj Auto is a prominent player in India's automotive industry, holding a substantial 77.9% market share in the three-wheeler segment.

headline: Q4 results today: Ola Electric, Mazagon Dock, Suzlon Energy, Bajaj Auto & 552 others to declare earnings on May 29
intro: Q4 results today: On May 29, 2025, 556 companies, including Alkem Laboratories, Bajaj Auto, and Ola Electric Mobility, are set to announce their Q4 financial results.
imagecaption: Q4 results today: Ola Electric, Suzlon Energy, Bajaj Auto to announce earnings on Thursday, May 29, 2025.

headline: Bajaj sharpens international play as it takes full control of Austrian brand KTM via ?800 million debt deal
intro: The fresh infusion of funds is largely intended to pay off KTM?s creditors and ensure the continuity of its business.
